## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                           | Type      | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `small`  | `small`   | True for smaller height and font size in tab headers. | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `styles` | `styles`  | (optional) Injected CSS styles                        | `string`  | `undefined` |
